name: Gun Smith Demo
description:
Hello welcome to gun smith where every thing wants to kill you. armed with the ability to craft your own weapons from anything you are on a quest to get to the infinifactory, a factory that can make anything

CONTROLS

Use your mouse to aim.

SMITHING

To start smithing you will need to use a workbench which can be found at the merchants camp in levels.

Interacting with this brings up the smithing screen on your PDA using this and then selecting a part of your weapon on the HUD you can easily cycle through all the available parts. If you dont have apart in your inventory then you will need scrap top make it. Exiting this interface will save your gun configuration

LEVELS

levels in gun smith are randomly generated, you can stay in one as long as you want to but enemies will try to overwhelm you though they do drop better gear. To go to a level just use the teleporter once it is active.

When you are in a level you will need to find HUBs interacting with these will call forth waves of enemies and once you clear all the Hubs the teleporter for that level will become active and you can proceed to the boss.

That is all for now. I HOPE YOU ENJOY THIS DEMO, MADE WITH LOVE BY WAZA_DEV : ) 

Music by NoMab: https://www.youtube.com/c/NOmAbMusic ,https://www.fiverr.com/nomab_beats
